National Service Projects Organization (NSPO) na-emepụta ngwaahịa ndị agha na ndị nkịtị ma na-enye ọrụ nkwekọrịta.
Ọ bụ n'okpuru usoro Ministry of Defence nke Egypt, ọ bụrụ na e hiwere ya dịka iwu onye isi ala No.32 nke 1979 si dị n'okpuru Onye isi ala Anwar Sadat.

ị, ma kọwaa ngwaọrụ e mere iji "nweta afọ ojuju nke mkpa ndị agha iji belata ibu arọ nke njikwa nke ibu arọ steeti site na iwebata ikike mmepụta ihe karịrị akarị n'ahịa mpaghara ma nyere aka na ọrụ mmepe akụ na ụba steeti site n'ịmepụta ihe dị mgbagwoju anya.
